Text: Bear Island Opportunity Cc As mentioned earlier we have the opportunity to sell a MW x fixed for floating financial swap to these guys for years beginning They want offers from both the PJMEast and PJMWest Hubs In an effort to lower the fixed price they are willing to sell let us curtail during MondayFriday for the term of the deal on an hourahead basis There can be a variety of call option structures depending upon which gives them the largest premium options being number of hours which we can curtail each day Nick has begun working on valuing an at the money x call effectively an hour curtailment with hourahead notice Rob Benson is pricing the swap As soon as we get the swap price and the resulting strike price for the call Nick can firm up his initial valuation and we can discuss with you Billy Braddock Manager Enron Power Marketing Inc work fax cell

FW BRADDOCKITIN ONLY NON REF OR REFUNDABLEFYI This is the flight and hotel I booked for SEPA I did NOT book your reservation but did get the nonrefundable ticket BB Original Message From JAN SKOOG mailto Sent Monday July PM To Braddock Billy Cc CHARVEYENRONCOM Subject BRADDOCKITIN ONLY NON REF OR REFUNDABLE AGENT JSJS BOOKING REF YEIB BRADDOCKEDWARD ENRON SMITH HOUSTON TX ATTNCLAUDETTE HARVEY X DATE JUL SERVICE DATE FROM TO DEPART ARRIVE CONTINENTAL AIRLINES AUG HOUSTON TX ATLANTA GA P P CO V THU GBUSH INTERCO W B HARTSFIELD TERMINAL C TERMINAL N NON STOP RESERVATION CONFIRMED DURATION AIRCRAFT BOEING SEAT C NO SMOKING CONFIRMED BRADDOCKEDWARD CAR AUG NATIONAL ATLANTA GA AUG CONFIRMATION COUNT TELEPHONE FAX FULL DOOR CAR AUTOMATIC AIR RATE USDDYUNL MI RATE QUOTED BASE RATE ZLUSD BRDY PICKUP ATLANTA INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT ATLANTA DROPOFF ATLANTA INTERNATIONAL AIRPORT ATLANTA HOTEL AUG DAYS INN ELBERTON AUG ELBERT STREET HWY ELBERTON GA UNITED STATES OF AMERICA TELEPHONE FAX TELEX NONE CONFIRMATION REFERENCE NKSCC SINGLE ROOM RATE USD PER NIGHT GUARANTEE GIVEN CMFD NS KING PM DAY OF ARRIVAL XCL POLICY AT THE DAYS INN ELBERTON CONTINENTAL AIRLINES AUG ATLANTA GA HOUSTON TX P P CO K FRI W B HARTSFIELD GBUSH INTERCO TERMINAL N TERMINAL C SNACK NON STOP RESERVATION CONFIRMED DURATION AIRCRAFT MCDONNELL DOUGLAS MD ALL SERIES RESERVATION NUMBERS COVGNWP CO FREQUENT FLYER COGL NONREFUNDABLE TKT MINIMUM CHANGE FEE THIS IS A TICKETLESS RESERVATION PLEASE HAVE A PICTURE ID AVAILABLE AT THE AIRPORT THANK YOU THANK YOU FOR CALLING VITOL TRAVEL VITOL TRAVEL LOUISIANA STE HOUSTON TX PHONE FAX Do You Yahoo Make international calls for as low as minute with Yahoo Messenger

FW SEPA termsheetPls review and make comments BB Original Message From Braddock Billy Sent Monday August AM To Rorschach Reagan Subject SEPA termsheet Take a look at this My only thought is we may want to simplify it even more if anything BB

FPL Cc Spoke to FPL this am Looks as if they may be in a position to offer firm LD at a JEA interface for Cal Gerry will complete his analysis by midweek to see what volume they will have available for an LD product Keep you posted Billy Braddock Manager Enron Power Marketing Inc work fax cell

Georgia CustomersKevin Tomorrow I am meeting with separate consulting groups that represent collectively EMCs in Georgia As a result of our calling efforts it appears as if these are some of the larger EMCs under Oglethorpe I think these groups are planning to break apart from OPC and form new agencies in one in the other I plan to get as many details on this as possible during the meetings There are opportunities at this point with specific EMCs in each of these groups Both are to buy energy on the Georgia ITS MW x JanFeb and MW x yrs beginning prefer load following at a load factor but will consider a block purchase Im going to get more details on these separate requests but wanted your initial interest level Thanks Billy Braddock Manager Enron Power Marketing Inc work fax cell

Southern CoJust spoke to one of their traders Their credit is as are all of our counterparties conducting a credit review As of this morning they are not putting on any trading restrictions with us They have discussed implementing a netting agreement but we have responded that we will not especially without updating the current enabling agreement with a EEI which they are opposed to Keep you posted Billy Braddock Manager Enron Power Marketing Inc work fax cell

New Smyrna Park and LendKevin New Smyrna is open to a ParkLend arrangement Im looking into transmission availability to and from New Smyrna currently They are interconnected with FPL and FPC Any interest in this location for a parking deal Billy Braddock Manager Enron Power Marketing Inc work fax cell

Key West MWA few more details on this This is a MW QF on the FPC system They are offering x energy yrs beginning The facility is near Tallahassee but on the FPC system He said he would guaranty availability off the unit The best bid he has on the table currently is When I run availability on the model your MID is MID for Firm LDfor comparison Any interest in this product Billy Braddock Manager Enron Power Marketing Inc work fax cell

New SmyrnaKevin I just met w New Smyrna They are interested in a parking deal They can probably only do up to MW but they have done these deals in the past and are comfortable with how they work I will be back in Houston on Fri You can reach me at if you need anything Billy Braddock

RE Cal into SOCO offerJust FYI Theyre cleaning up their slop hes long an odd MW block I told him no offer on the odd block Original Message From Presto Kevin M Sent Thursday October PM To Braddock Billy Subject RE Cal into SOCO offer I will show him a MW block Original Message From Braddock Billy Sent Thursday October PM To Presto Kevin M Subject Cal into SOCO offer Kevin Any interest if offering an odd block of MW into SOCO x Cal Duke Energy is asking I told him it would be at a premium to our EOL offer for the odd block if we would sell it at all Billy Braddock Manager Enron Power Marketing Inc work fax cell

Cal into SOCO offerKevin Any interest if offering an odd block of MW into SOCO x Cal Duke Energy is asking I told him it would be at a premium to our EOL offer for the odd block if we would sell it at all Billy Braddock Manager Enron Power Marketing Inc work fax cell
GTCDuval spreadMorgan has no offer on this They arent comfortable offering at the Duval substation at this point Billy Braddock Manager Enron Power Marketing Inc work fax cell

TECO RFPKevin As we discussed TECO is offering up to MW of a total MW beginning off the Gannon facility which is being converted from coal to a gasfired CC plant called Bayside The plant is in Tampa FL and the offering is unitcontingent TECO prefers to sell a toll where we bring the gas but is open to other proposals I figure we can bid for any of a few structures toll where we bring the gas toll indexed to a gas hub where TECO is respons for gas supply fixed price call I think an at the money call would be the cleanest solution avoid inefficiencys associated with the heat rate curve which varies by MW amount utilized gas supply risk etc What is your preferred structure How many MW would you like to show a bid for Structuring ran an initial valuation for a year daily call MW Results are below TECO RFP Curve Into FRCC Strike Size MW Availability Term kWmo MWh PVd Premium Bid Mid Billy Braddock Manager Enron Power Marketing Inc work fax cell

WansleySouthern is evaluting the x offer from the Wansley delivery point They indicated hesitance to offer LD but are more amenable to offer LD if have choice of delivery points I indicated we had the preference of Wansley but would also consider Scherer Ill let you know what they come back with Billy Braddock Manager Enron Power Marketing Inc work fax cell

RE SOCOGaITS SpreadBest offer Ive gotten thus far is from Dyn Still waiting for offers from others BB Original Message From Presto Kevin M Sent Friday October AM To Braddock Billy Subject RE SOCOGaITS Spread Im bid for this spread in Cal Original Message From Braddock Billy Sent Friday October AM To Presto Kevin M Subject SOCOGaITS Spread Spoke to Lew at Morgan In summary hes for this spread He spent some time to explain why his market is not tighter Basically the underlying philosophy of their shop is to NOT jump into the new less liquid markets until they develop further They would almost rather see a few markets develop within the region with high liquidity in each market as opposed to many markets in the region with low liquidity in each market My response was to be part of developing many market in the region all with high liquidity But in order to do so and help all the players in the market we need other participants All that being said his offer is for the Cal into SOCOon GaITS spread x Im going to try some of the others Williams Dyn Mirant may be players Billy Braddock Manager Enron Power Marketing Inc work fax cell

SOCOGaITS SpreadSpoke to Lew at Morgan In summary hes for this spread He spent some time to explain why his market is not tighter Basically the underlying philosophy of their shop is to NOT jump into the new less liquid markets until they develop further They would almost rather see a few markets develop within the region with high liquidity in each market as opposed to many markets in the region with low liquidity in each market My response was to be part of developing many market in the region all with high liquidity But in order to do so and help all the players in the market we need other participants All that being said his offer is for the Cal into SOCOon GaITS spread x Im going to try some of the others Williams Dyn Mirant may be players Billy Braddock Manager Enron Power Marketing Inc work fax cell

Another GaITS ProspectKevin A consultant Energy Consulting Group in Ga representing an Arated EMC is looking for MW x JanFeb firm LD energy on not into the GaITS that is from any generation source on the ITS or thru the interface and on the ITS From what I know about the Energy Consulting Group they represent of the larger EMCs in Ga We are going to meet with these guys in weeks to see what deals they have available It looks like it may be a good opportunity for more short positions on the GaITS Billy Braddock Manager Enron Power Marketing Inc work fax cell

TECO OfferingTECO is issuing an RFP to sell up to MW beginning June TECO is converting its coalfired Gannon facility into a gasfired combinedcycle plant to be Bayside Facility It will be a unit plant They are selling cap and energy off of units which have combined output of MW using FA turbines At full load the net plant heat rate is I should receive the RFP shortly They are looking to sell a toll off of the plant Billy Braddock Manager Enron Power Marketing Inc work fax cell

RE TEA into MEAGTEA is ok with allowing hourly scheduling from either internal units or to the border as long as Enron is handling all scheduling and tags and gives sufficient notice for schedule changes I assured him that we would handle those functions So we need to offer for JuneSep MW x Cal MW x Billy Original Message From Presto Kevin M Sent Tuesday October PM To Braddock Billy Subject RE TEA into MEAG We need the hourly option to allow for nonGTC sources but we will deliver intoGTC border hourly Original Message From Braddock Billy Sent Tuesday October PM To Presto Kevin M Subject RE TEA into MEAG TEA will let us go hourly times per month and change the source if we go hourly as long as the source remains a unit on the GaITS However he doesnt want a full MW block in the JuneSept period just MW The MW is actually already at the high end of his range needs MW for JuneSep Original Message From Presto Kevin M Sent Monday October PM To Braddock Billy Subject RE TEA into MEAG Will he let us go hourly at least times per month and change the source if we go hourly This essentially would require they provide parking and lending for up MW in the Cal and MW in the JuneSept Can we at least get a MW block in the JuneSept period Original Message From Braddock Billy Sent Monday October PM To Presto Kevin M Subject RE TEA into MEAG An offer from any Scherer units would work He understands the odd lot will demand a premium but I cant talk him into a round MW So pieces of energy JuneSep MW x Cal MW x Original Message From Presto Kevin M Sent Monday October AM To Braddock Billy Subject RE TEA into MEAG Ask him if Scherer andor would work Let him know that an odd lot would command a Mwh premium on top In addition even if we used Scherer it would be from any one of the facilities therefore the transmission would need to be able to use any of the Scherer units as a source Original Message From Braddock Billy Sent Monday October AM To Presto Kevin M Subject TEA into MEAG TEA is looking to buy MW x JuneSep into MEAG Also looking to buy MW x Cal into MEAG I told them we may be more willing to offer into GTC His response was he would need to know which facility or interface would be the source I suspect this is so he can reserve ahead to use his network transmission Any interest Billy Braddock Manager Enron Power Marketing Inc work fax cell

Oglethorpe into GTCOglethorpe has no interest in buying for Cal However he does have an interest to buy MW Dec into GTC x if you wont offer x hes still interested in x Any interest in offering here Billy
TennisIm still not up for a game today Are you around this weekend Maybe we can play Sat or Sun My home phone is BB

Sunday TennisWere on to play on Sunday at at River Oaks Country Club Were going to meet at Rogers house at His address is Ella Lee and his home phone is Directions Going north on Kirby Ella Lee is the rd or th street north of Westheimer Go left west on Ella Lee off of Kirby His house is about a block down on the left old red brick house See you Sunday Billy Braddock Manager Enron Power Marketing Inc work fax cell
